issue.title: [Rust] Add sort for float types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7924](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7924). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Floats need a different sort approach than other primitives, and this ticket will implement them separately

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7924?focusedCommentId=17155754) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7193
